episode_summary: This episode features discussions on unusual allergies caused by tick bites, the upcoming 2038 Millennium Bug, the extensive diaries of Buckminster Fuller, and the naming of a new fish species, the Blue Bastard. Special guest Dr. Karl Kruszelnicki joins the hosts to share insights and humor.

facts.fact: Two people in Sydney every week get bitten by ticks and shortly after become allergic to meat for the rest of their lives.
The Millennium Bug is going to hit in 2038.
Buckminster Fuller's complete diaries take up over 80 metres of shelf space.
Australian scientists have recently named a newly discovered species of fish Blue Bastard.
